attributes.action: require all new buildings to capture rainwater for local use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rainwater can be collected and stored underground and used for toilet flushing, vehicle washing, gardening etc.  This would reduce consumption of piped water

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "require all new buildings to capture rainwater for local use."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12184.asp
